comment.author: 14708865@N06
comment._content: Hi, I just created a group for photos with a lighthouse shown, but where that lighthouse is not the main subject but just a detail. It is nothing serious, just because I like photos with a different view on lighthouses. The groupis called Not a lighthouse photo, and if you like to, I would be happy to see your photo in that group too. (It's not much yet, I just started it).

comment.author: 36620063@N04
comment._content: She looks to be about 12 or 13 years old, and I love the sea backdrop that was clearly in a studio.
